item.description:
Last Call for Tickets! Please Update your RSVP. The Wine List is posted on the Boston Uncorked site. I have seen a preview of the food that Radius is serving and it looks great. Please allow extra travel time due to post Blizzard conditions.

Join Boston Uncorked for an exclusive evening of fine food and wine at Boston's premier Four Star restaurant, Radius! on Tuesday, February 12 from 7:00 - 9:00pm.  

Boston Uncorked will be featuring a fine selection of ports along with tasty chocolate treats from Radius!

Members from my Red Sox Natives will also be joining us.

Capacity and Tickets are limited. Tickets are $39.00 per person. In order to attend you must purchase a ticket in advance from Boston Uncorked on line. To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com [url=http://www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]. Please do not call or contact any other source for tickets.

 

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby ay 6:45 PM or Inside after 7:00 PM
item.name: Boston Uncorked Wine Event at Radius - Wines For Your Valentine
